Summary: Clear with lights on the ends 2 and sometime 3 making a triangle.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Carson
There were no other sightings in Carson on or around April 6th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my Son were Driving home from his work and was almost home and he heard a VERY LOUD RUMBLING and we looked up to see what it was and we seen 2 lights and right over head. Sometime there were 3 lights and it made a Triangle shape. But the Weird thing was it as Clear we could see everything on the other side of the Craft like Stars so it must have been Invisible compleltely tranparent. It just flew away towards Down Town L.A.
